resources.string: Manage WLAN, Bluetooth, airplane mode, mobile networks, & VPNs
"Don't connect to a WLAN network unless it has good Internet connectivity"
Minimize battery usage when WLAN is on
To see available networks, turn WLAN on.
"You don't have permission to change the WLAN network."
Press the WLAN Protected Setup button on your router. It may be called \"WPS\" or contain this symbol:

"To improve location accuracy and for other purposes, %1$s wants to turn on network scanning, even when WLAN is off.
Allow this for all apps that want to scan?"
The phone was unable to connect to this WLAN network.
Use GPS, WLAN and mobile networks to estimate location
Use WLAN and mobile networks to estimate location
Let apps use data from sources such as WLAN and mobile networks to determine your approximate location
"Turn off WLAN when not using it or when it isn't available"
Back up app data, WLAN passwords, and other settings to Google servers
Stop backing up your WLAN passwords, bookmarks, other settings, and app data, plus erase all copies on Google servers?
"You can't configure an EAP WLAN connection during setup. After setup, you can do that in Settings > Wireless & networks."

Touch Next" to continue with setup.
Touch "Back to connect to a different WLAN network.
Disable background data on mobile data network only. WLAN will be used if available.

"This feature may cause an app that depends on background data to stop working when WLAN isn't available.
You can find more appropriate data usage controls in the settings available within the app."
"If you restrict background mobile data, some apps and services won't work unless you're connected to a WLAN network."

"If you restrict background mobile data, some apps and services won't work unless you're connected to a WLAN network.
This setting affects all users on this phone."

Select the WLAN networks that are mobile hotspots. Apps can be restricted from using these networks when running in the background. Apps may also generate warnings when using these networks for large downloads.
To select mobile hotspots, turn WLAN on.

"You can share this device with other people by creating additional users. Each user has their own space, which they can customize with their own apps, wallpaper, and so on. Users can also adjust tablet settings like WLAN that affect everyone.
After you create a new user, that person needs to go through a setup process.
Any user can accept updated app permissions on behalf of all other users."
Allow modification of WLAN and Mobile settings

Huawei Beam lets you transfer files, such as pictures, videos, contacts and URLs, between your device and another NFC-capable device. Huawei Beam is activated by placing the two devices close together (usually back to back) and tapping your screen. Please note that your Bluetooth or WLAN may be turned on automatically before file transmission.
Display your phone screen on another display over a WLAN connection

"Huawei Beam lets you transfer files to other NFC devices by placing the devices close together. For example, you can wirelessly transfer pictures, videos, contacts, URLs, and more between two NFC-capable devices. Simply: 1. Place the front panel of your device against another NFC device, and pick up your device after you hear a tone. 2. Touch your screen within three seconds of hearing the tone. 3. Place the front panel of your device against the other NFC device again to complete the transfer. Please note that your Bluetooth or WLAN may be turned on automatically before file transmission."
To complete the setup, your tablet needs access to a WLAN network. Once setup is complete, you can switch between mobile data and WLAN.
